article_title: US Must Leverage Aid to Stop Child Sexual Abuse Among Afghan Security Officials
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: According to NYTimes U.S. military officers were told by their superiors to ignore acts of alleged child rape and molestation committed by Afghan police.
